title: A Deadly Medieval Path in England Claims a Modern Victim: An Amazon Van
summary_full: The Broomway in Essex is notoriously treacherous because of the quick-moving waters surrounding it. One delivery vehicle didn’t make it.
summary_public: The Broomway in Essex is notoriously treacherous because of the quick-moving waters surrounding it. One delivery vehicle didn’t make it.

GB.label: neutral
